channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Discret Choice Modelling Lesson

item.title: Introduction to Discret Choice Lesson
item.description: Introduction These Introduction slides present: Table of contents Introduction Program Motivations Importance of DCM Course Objectives General Context of Choice analysis Four broad frameworks Sample and Measurement Issues in Model Building R and Tests for Categorical Data Inference for a (Single) Proportion Two-Way Contingency Tables The Odds-Ratio Chi-Squared Tests of Independence Program 5 steps/lessons : • Introduction • Binary Choice • Multinomial Choices • Advanced Models : papers presentation (with application) • Discussion : papers discussion (reversed class) • Guided work sessions
